exceptions.tactic: rewrite <- (Ring.ax4 K (Ring.class K) x zero (opp x)).
exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "plus (Ring.mult K (Ring.class K) x (opp x)) (Ring.mult K (Ring.class K) zero (opp x))" in the current goal.
Illegal application (Non-functional construction): The expression "plus_opp_r x" of type "plus x (opp x) = zero" cannot be applied to the term "Ring.class K" : "Ring.class_of K"
The LHS of (plus_zero_r x) (plus x zero) does not match any subterm of the goal

exceptions.tactic: rewrite (Ring.ax1 K (Ring.class K) x zero (opp x)).
exceptions.exn: The LHS of (Ring.ax1 K (Ring.class K) x zero (opp x)) (Ring.mult K (Ring.class K) x (Ring.mult K (Ring.class K) zero (opp x))) does not match any subterm of the goal
Illegal application (Non-functional construction): The expression "plus_opp_l x" of type "plus (opp x) x = zero" cannot be applied to the term "Ring.class K" : "Ring.class_of K"

exceptions.tactic: rewrite (plus_zero_l (Ring.mult K (Ring.class K) x (Ring.one K (Ring.class K)))).
exceptions.exn: The LHS of (plus_zero_l (Ring.mult K (Ring.class K) x (Ring.one K (Ring.class K)))) (plus zero (Ring.mult K (Ring.class K) x (Ring.one K (Ring.class K)))) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of (mult_one_l x) (mult one x) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment K : Ring x : K Unable to unify "Ring.mult K (Ring.class K) (Ring.one K (Ring.class K)) zero" with "mult x (Ring.mult K (Ring.class K) (Ring.one K (Ring.class K)) zero)".

original: intros x. rewrite <- (Ring.ax3 K (Ring.class K) zero). rewrite <- (Ring.ax4 K (Ring.class K) x zero (opp x)). rewrite (plus_opp_r x (Ring.class K)). rewrite (plus_zero_r x). rewrite (Ring.ax1 K (Ring.class K) x zero (opp x)). rewrite (plus_opp_l x (Ring.class K)). rewrite (plus_zero_l (Ring.mult K (Ring.class K) x (Ring.one K (Ring.class K)))). rewrite (mult_one_l x). reflexivity.
